name: Enigmator
description: Item highlighter for Diablo II: Resurrected - Never miss a drop again!
author: Noobient

config.name: Light Beam on Runes
config.description: Apply a light beam effect on rune drops.

config.name: Light Beam on Gems
config.description: Apply a light beam effect on gem drops.

config.name: Highlight Bases
config.description: Highlight desirable runeword / recipe bases with a colorful suffix. Due to technical limitations, this will also apply to magic, rare, unique, and crafted items.

config.name: Assassin Charges HUD
config.description: Enable a visual overlay to indicate the state of your assassin MA charges.

children.name: Y Axis Position
children.description: Sets the height of the overlay.
